<script>
SET _tmp=D:\AD
IF NOT EXIST %_tmp%\StateDir MKDIR %_tmp%\StateDir
IF NOT EXIST E:\EVIDENCE MKDIR E:\EVIDENCE
IF NOT EXIST F:\CASES MKDIR F:\CASES
EXIT /B
</script>
wmic product where "description='Amazon SSM Agent' " uninstall

<script>
SET _tmp=D:\AD
IF NOT EXIST %_tmp%\ADTemp MKDIR %_tmp%\ADTemp
EXIT /B
</script>
wmic product where "description='Amazon SSM Agent' " uninstall

<powershell>
# INITIALIZEDISKS
C:\ProgramData\Amazon\EC2-Windows\Launch\Scripts\InitializeDisks.ps1
# CREATE DIRS
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path D:\SQLData
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path D:\SQLBackups
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path E:\SQLLogs
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path F:\SQLTemp
# GRANT PERMISSIONS
$rule = new-object System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule ("NT Service\MSSQLSERVER","FullControl","Allow")
$dir = "D:\SQLData"
$acl = Get-ACL $dir
$acl.SetAccessRule($rule)
Set-ACL -Path $dir -AclObject $acl
$dir = "D:\SQLBackups"
$acl = Get-ACL $dir
$acl.SetAccessRule($rule)
Set-ACL -Path $dir -AclObject $acl
$dir = "E:\SQLLogs"
$acl = Get-ACL $dir
$acl.SetAccessRule($rule)
Set-ACL -Path $dir -AclObject $acl
$dir = "F:\SQLTemp"
$acl = Get-ACL $dir
$acl.SetAccessRule($rule)
Set-ACL -Path $dir -AclObject $acl
# ADJUST MEMORY SETTINGS
[System.Reflection.Assembly]::LoadWithPartialName('Microsoft.SqlServer.SMO') | out-null
$s = New-Object ('Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Server') "localhost"
$s.Configuration.MinServerMemory.ConfigValue = 512
$s.Configuration.MaxServerMemory.ConfigValue = 57344
$s.Configuration.Alter()
# MOVE TEMPDBs
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "USE [master]"
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev.mdf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev1, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev1.ndf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev2, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev2.ndf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev3, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev3.ndf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev4, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev4.ndf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev5, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev5.ndf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev6, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev6.ndf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = tempdev7, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\tempdev7.ndf') "
Invoke-SQLCMD -Query "ALTER DATABASE TempDB MODIFY FILE (NAME = templog, FILENAME = 'F:\SQLTemp\templog.ldf') "
# RESTART SQL
Restart-Service MSSQLSERVER -Force
# DELETE OLD TEMPDBs
Remove-Item path C:\SQLTemp recurse
</powershell>
wmic product where "description='Amazon SSM Agent' " uninstall
